alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Macon, western Dooly and northeastern Sumter Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Methvins, or 9 miles east of Americus, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Oglethorpe, Byromville, Andersonville, Lilly, Dooling, Lamar, New Era, Flint River Wma, Pennington, Andersonville National Historic, Drayton, Clearview and Methvins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
